p: Figure 7 shows the crystallography of CGHAZ and FGHAZ by EBSD. It is clear that CGHAZ had the larger grain ( Figure 7a) compared with FGHAZ ( Figure 7c). The EBSD superimposed figure in Figure 7b–d of band contrast and grain boundaries indicated that the number of boundaries with the misorientation >15° in FGHAZ was greater than in CGHAZ, which means that the effective grain size in FGHAZ was smaller than that in CGHAZ. The comparison is presented in Figure 7e. This agreed well with the in situ observation of martensite transformation.
